title: Himi 5
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku ui ‘a e ‘Eiki
‘I he’ene ‘ofa,
Ki he kakai tu’utāmaki
‘I he’enau hia.
2.
Pea ‘oku finangalo
‘A ‘Ene ‘Afio
Ke tafoki kotoa pē
‘A e angahala.
3.
Mo e kau foki ki mui
Pea tō ki lalo
‘Oua na’a mou li’aki
Homou laumālie.
4.
He ‘oku kau ‘a e lea
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Ki he kakai kuo hinga
‘I he angahala.
5.
‘Oku pehē mai ‘e ia,
Ke mou toe kumi,
He ‘oku ou anga’ofa
Ke mou mo’ui ai. *
